name: CapCut AI Suite
tagline: Create, edit, or remix content with AI in a simple editor
description: Introducing CapCut AI Editing - Your smart editing partner for camera + prompt-led creation. From auto edits to avatars, smart cuts, and asset generation, it‚Äôs AI editing the CapCut way: simple, powerful, smart.

name: Katalog
tagline: Talk to your reading list
description: Save articles for later and listen to them with high-quality AI narration. Use your voice while listening to ask questions, take notes, or highlight important points.

name: 100 Vibe Coding
tagline: From zero to your first project in 100 challenges
description: Learn to build projects fast with 100 vibe coding challenges. Experiment in the sandbox, test your ideas, and share them with friends. Then follow step-by-step tutorials to launch your very first real project.

name: Speech to Note Mobile App
tagline: Taking Notes on the Go! Online, offline
description: Talk it out. Speech to Note write it down. ‚úçÔ∏èüéôÔ∏è A random idea, a blog post, or your next big presentation ‚Äî just speak and we‚Äôll turn it into clean, structured notes. No typing. No distractions. Just talk ‚Äî and get notes you can actually use.

name: Clips by xdge.ai
tagline: Ditch Meetings and effortlessly capture + rewind your day
description: Easily record and share clips to eliminate meetings. An AI note-taker can record, autonomously attend, and create speaker-tagged transcripts, summaries, action items, and coaching insights. Notes become part of a replayable collection of workplace knowledge.

name: Stax
tagline: Move your LLM evals from vibes to data
description: Stax is a tool from Google Labs to solve LLM evaluation. Move beyond "vibe testing" by building custom autoraters to measure what matters to you. It's a full toolkit for testing your AI stack with your data, with support for all major model providers.

name: TextJam
tagline: The multi-player AI editor, for everyone who writes.
description: TextJam is an AI editor with novel twists on how humans co-write with AI (and each other). From typing in pen and pencil, to inline prompting, to gestures that resize text, TextJam is a bold new take on what a word processor can be.

name: Heep
tagline: The AI front desk for modern restaurants
description: Heep is your restaurant‚Äôs AI host, handling guest messages and calls on WhatsApp, Instagram, Messenger, and voice. It connects to tools like Sevenrooms or OpenTable and replies instantly, in any language. Fully customized, no chatbot builder needed.

name: bestie
tagline: like chatgpt with your friends
description: ai search meets groupchat. perfect for friend groups, classes, or families.

name: Brick Coder AI
tagline: Build powerful agents in seconds with AI CANVA GENERATOR
description: Compose modular AI agents with drag-and-drop blocks. Connect backends, frontends, and goal-based logic. Export clean code or deploy instantly.

name: doQment
tagline: Turn websites into ephemeral MCP servers! From docs, to code
description: Transform any website into a comprehensive MCP-like information retrieval system for AI coding agents. - Create account - Crawl (rest or manually) - Connect and done. Free credits for new accounts as an experiment.

name: iWeaver Agents
tagline: One-click AI productivity tool to summarize everything
description: iWeaver, powered by ChatGPT and Claude, is an AI co-pilot built for professionals, students, teachers, researchers, content creators, and business executives. It supports summarization, analysis, and decision support for multi-format documents.

name: Talking Translator
tagline: Left Ear Spanish, Right Ear English - Instant Translation
description: Supports 74 languages with real-time bilingual conversation translation. Put on your earbuds: hear Spanish in the left ear, English in the right. You can ask LLM-powered questions about the conversation, text + photo translation and even offline mode.

name: iBuildThis
tagline: Build real projects with AI and real teams
description: Connect with developers, join real-world projects, and build your portfolio with iBuildThis. AI-powered project matching and real-time collaboration.

name: InvoX
tagline: Self-hosted invoicing software for small businesses
description: One-time payment, self-hosted invoice management software InvoX. Create branded invoices, automate billing & expenses, and keep 100% of your revenue, no monthly fees.

name: Minnas
tagline: Share prompts and context with your team
description: Minnas allows you to share prompts, workflows, and resources seamlessly to tools like Cursor and Claude Code via MCP. Upload files and images, connect URLs and define prompts. They are then instantly available across your team & AI tools.

name: Pinkfish - Vibe Workflow Automation
tagline: Idea to automation without the wait
description: Create workflow automations by describing them - no more dragging boxes or wiring arrows. Pinkfish is an AI-native platform that combines the power of RPA and iPaaS to connect apps, process documents, scrape the web, and orchestrate workflows.

name: Wamellow
tagline: Text-to-Speech for Discord Voice Chats and more
description: Neutral and TikTok-like Text-to-Speech for Discord Voice Chats with 97 Voices in 10 Languages. You can talk in voice chats with `/tts voice` or setup a dedicated channel! Great for people with aphonia, dysphonia, or other speech impairments.

name: Ideogram Styles
tagline: Bring your ideas to life with powerful styles
description: Ideogram Styles makes it easy to turn a basic prompt into stunning visuals. With curated aesthetics at your fingertips, your prompts instantly become more refined and expressive.

name: DraftBot
tagline: Generate Professional Proposals in Minutes
description: Transform meeting notes into professional proposal documents with DraftBot's AI-powered generator. Create comprehensive proposals with smart extraction, templates, and export to PDF/Word in minutes.

tagline: Create, edit, or remix content with AI in a simple editor
